official_title: To amend title 23, United States Code, to require the Secretary of Transportation to carry out a grant program for providing financial assistance for local rail line relocation projects, and for other purposes.
short_title: Community Rail Line Relocation Assistance Act of 2003

summary.text: Community Rail Line Relocation Assistance Act of 2003 - Amends Federal highway law to direct the Secretary of Transportation to carry out a grant program to provide financial assistance to States for up to 90 percent of the cost of local rail line relocation projects.

titles.title: Community Rail Line Relocation Assistance Act of 2003

To amend title 23, United States Code, to require the Secretary of Transportation to carry out a grant program for providing financial assistance for local rail line relocation projects, and for other purposes.
